name: Caster (itch) (Andrometa)
description:
This project will be my first, and will be completely free during development, donations may open part way through development and will at release, but the game will remain free to download for ever.

Although most of my projects will be completely free, some of my more focused and harder projects will be open to donations so that I can get upgraded equipment for making more resource intensive games. Donations will go towards hardware upgrades mainly and potentially hiring graphic designers for future team related projects.

Project name will and is subject to change.
